<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scouring Rage](/Feats.aspx?ID=5833) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 80 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
an instinct that allows you to change your additional damage from [Rage](/Actions.aspx?ID=2802) to a different damage type

**Trigger**
You Rage.

</column>

---

You emit a powerful surge of instinctual energy when you unleash your anger. Each enemy within 20 feet takes damage equal to your level ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save against your class DC) of the same type as your additional damage during that Rage.
